attributes.action: Retailers to place DVD and Game cases with disturbing (e.g. horror, violent) images on upper shelves to safeguard children
attributes.additional_details: This petition seeks Parliament to require retailers to place DVD or gaming cases that carry increasingly graphic images (and associated advertising) at a height appropriate to the age rating, making disturbing images shown on DVD and game covers less likely to be seen by children in supermarkets and other retailers.
